page.title: 11Peterlee House Problems.
page.content: Most of the houses that have been {re-modernised}are being sold after they have been cleaned out. The workmen have put new{window frames in and have made{drive-ways}for the cars to park. They have knocked down old{coal bunkers}and put new ones in the gardens. They have taken up old{floor boards and put new ones in. They have also put{new doors}and put{new locks}on them. All of the{steps}have been dug up and new ones put in. All of the{stairs have been taken out and new ones have been put in. The workmen have made the{windows smaller and have put in new{paths. They have built{new internal walls}and put{new electric sockets}in them.
